actions.text: On agreeing to the Sherman amendment (A009) Agreed to by recorded vote: 247 - 175 (Roll No. 229).

description: Amendment establishes a national hotline administered by the Department of Justice and financed by a user fee for public access to the FBI database on sexual offenders.
purpose: An amendment to establish a national hotline administered by the Department of Justice and financed by a user fee for public access to the FBI database of convicted sexual predators.
